pages.title: Proxima Centauri
pages.text: Once you have found enough Electrolyte to craft a tier eleven rocket, you will be able to leave this solar system and enter a new one. The first planet that you will head to in Proxima Centauri is Glacio. Glacio is brutally cold; however, it has oxygen, allowing you to survive there without a spacesuit. The next planet is Proxima Centauri b, which is another earth-like planet.
This is the end of the Ad Astra progression. Thanks for playing Ad Astra & Ad Extendra!
